author: yiqiaoc11

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: /cc @daxian-dbw Could you please look the issue or close?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
It's not clear to me what kind of logging in was that, ssh? powershell remoting? else?
@yiqiaoc11 can you please provide more information about the issue, including repro steps and screenshots? Also, please try out the latest 7.0.0-rc.2 version of PowerShell to see if the issue remains.

title: After remotely logging onto a Ubuntu system, Backspace doesn't work and  path $ appearance is messy
